summary: The diff adds a frontend helper to construct/copy an icp0.io share link from an environment variable and introduces deployment documentation, but it does not (and cannot, from the shown changes) actually perform or guarantee a permanent non-draft Internet Computer deployment or provide the final stable icp0.io URL. Several additional frontend content/design/asset changes appear unrelated to the requested deployment/link-only scope and may conflict with the stated non-goals about not changing marketing content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the existing Beniwal Music Center app as a permanent (non-draft, non-expiring) Internet Computer canister so the public icp0.io URL remains stable and does not later show “invalid canister” / “Canister ID Not Resolved”.
missing_requirements.reason: The changes shown are limited to frontend code and documentation; there is no evidence of configuration or deployment artifacts (e.g., dfx canister IDs, network settings, CI/deploy scripts) that actually create a production (non-draft) deployment or ensure the canister remains permanently resolvable.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide the final permanent, shareable website link (icp0.io URL) that the user can send to others.
missing_requirements.reason: No concrete canister ID or final icp0.io URL is included; the implementation only constructs a URL at runtime from `import.meta.env.VITE_CANISTER_ID`, which is not the same as providing the final verified link.

hallucinated_features.description: Added in-app share link UI and copy-to-clipboard behavior based on VITE_CANISTER_ID.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request was to publish permanently and provide the final link; it did not ask to add new UI functionality to the website for sharing/copying the link.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed branding/design/SEO/static asset work (new gallery uploads, favicon updates, color palette/tailwind/theme changes, and additional attribution text).
hallucinated_features.reason: These appear to modify the existing marketing site content/appearance and add new assets, which were explicitly listed as non-goals (no changes to existing marketing content / no new sections).

hallucinated_features.description: Backend replaced with an empty Motoko actor containing only a comment stating no modifications are needed.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request did not ask for backend code changes; this change risks removing existing backend behavior (even if minimal) without a requirement driving it.
